curam.common.util.xml.dom

Class Document

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.common.util.xml.dom.Content
      • curam.common.util.xml.dom.Document
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DomWrapper

    public class Document
extends Content
    A Document defines an XML document. This implementation wraps a dom4j Document.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Document()
      Default constructor.
      Document(org.dom4j.Document dom4jDoc)
      Constructs a Document from a dom4j Document.
      Document(org.dom4j.Document dom4jDoc, java.lang.String uri)
      Constructs a Document from a dom4j Document and specified source.
      Document(Element root)
      Constructs a Document with the specified root element.

      • detachRootElement

        public Element detachRootElement()
        Removes this node from its parent if there is one. If this node is the root element of a document then it is removed from the document as well.
        Returns:
        the element being detached

      • cloneContent

        public java.util.List<Content> cloneContent()

        Returns:
        the cloned content

      • getAllElements

        public java.util.List<Element> getAllElements()
        Returns all the descendants of the document of type Element. Changes to this list are not reflected back onto the original content.
        Returns:
        the list of all elements in the document

      • getElements

        public java.util.List<Element> getElements(java.lang.String elementName)
        Returns all the descendants of the document of type Element with the same name as elementName. Changes to this list are not reflected back onto the original content.
        Parameters:
        elementName - name of the elements to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        the list of all elements in the document
